title: Coronation Street spoilers fuel Jade twist theory as she gets Fiz and Tyrone on side

Coronation Street newcomer Jade recently sparked speculation amongst fans she was hiding her true identity, after her random arrival, with spoilers now potentially backing this by revealing she gets closer to Fiz and Tyrone.

When Fiz returned to Weatherfield with troubled young daughter Hope last month, Jade joined them and was revealed to be her teaching assistant from her time away.

She's since moved in with the family as a live-in tutor, because Hope couldn't have her place back in her local school.

Next week, Fiz gets some alarming news that requires her to briefly leave Weatherfield as her mother is in hospital after an accident.

(Image: ITV)

Fiz doesn't want to leave Hope after her recent behaviour, and when her daughter hears about her plans to go away she becomes upset and angry.

Jade convinces Fiz to go though, telling her she can look after the girls with the help of Tyrone.

As Fiz continues to remain undecided, Jade persuades her to visit her mum claiming Hope is in safe hands.

(Image: ITV)

Later that day, she cooks Tyrone and Evelyn a meal to spend some time with them, before giving him a present.

She gifts him a dart board and it's not long before the trio have a game.

As the week goes on, Evelyn tries to set Jade up with neighbour Michael but she's not interested.

(Image: ITV)

First she claims she's too tired, and later on in the week she pretends to be sick.

But does the character have an ulterior motive amid speculation she could be secretly linked to the family?

Fans are wondering if she's related to the late villain John Stape, who is Hope's father.

Viewers think she could be his sister or his secret daughter, wanting to get close to the family - but nothing has been confirmed.

Coronation Street airs Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays at 7:30pm and 8:30pm on ITV.
description: Coronation Street viewers believe there's more to newcomer Jade, and next week their suspicions may rise
